PronInd specializes in IT based applications for Internal & External Compliance management. The combined capabilities of this association assists our clients in strengthening & streamling their compliance & internal control.

Indrone Aerosystems Ltd.

Drone based Surveillance solutions

Indrone Aerosystems Ltd., provides state of the art Drone based surveillance, monitoring and data acquisition services. Which combiend with SCC's core team's expertise enhances our Project Management consultancy and Audit capabilities.

ProInd Business Solutions Pvt. Ltd.

Compliance Management Software Services

PronInd specializes in IT based applications for Internal & External Compliance management. The combined capabilities of this association assists our clients in strengthening & streamling their compliance & internal control.

Ravi Rajan & Co LLP

Accountancy & Assurance Services

Enterprise Risk Management framework and analysis is an area where SCC is bullish on. The association with Ravi Rajan & Co., enables both firms to expand their ERM capabilities across various sectors, industries, roles and functions.

Aplicon Engineering & Services Pvt. Ltd

Accountancy & Assurance Services

Aplicon engages in Systems Engineering & commisioning , O&M, Project & Engineering management Consultancy for Power sector (Thermal and Gas) and for Sustainability Projects (Sewage Treatment, Flue Gas Desulphurization).

Komandoor & Co. LLP

Chartered Accountancy Services Firm

Komandoor & Co. and SCC leverage their network and the experience of their core team to handle Assurance & Audit assignments for various Government organisations, industries and sectors.

Civimec Engineering Ltd

Construciton Equipment & Materials Manufacturer

Civimec Engineering is a fast growing, High - Quality Construciton Equipment & Materials Manufacturing company. Our associaiton with them enables us to address and resolve Key Supply chain challenges in construction industry.

Brine Energy Pvt. Ltd.

Energy Infrastructure Project Management Consultancy

Brine Energy specialises in construction and consultancy of Transmission towers for electrical power transmission. Together, SCC and Brine work to address operational challenges and conduct techno-commercial audits across the Power sector.
